products.title: Basix Blackout Alabaster Cream 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their basix blackout range is an easy and effective method of freshening up your decor. This cool-toned cream 127mm vertical blind, a traditional neutral shade, is made of durable fabric and stylish 5 inch vanes. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and cream goes with nearly anything, whether its wooden accessories and floors or modern minimalist themes. Dress your bedroom or living room with this stylish vertical blind, which as well as being a blackout fabric is anti-allergy treated, to help you live out your days allergy-free.

products.title: Luxari Pvc Blackout Cream 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their luxari pvc blackout range is available in classic colours and is ideal for damp rooms or areas that are exposed to heat. This classic cream vertical blind is made from a pvc fabric so is therefore waterproof and flame retardant - perfect for kitchens and bathrooms. products.title: Metz Pvc Blackout Cream 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: The metz pvc blackout patterned range, changes colour shades when light hits it, and offers a wide array of colours to choose from. Waterproof and flame retardant, metz fabrics are durable and practical. Vertical blinds offer optimal light and privacy control, so are a firm favourite in the uk, especially with overlooked houses and office. This neutral, marbled, cream blackout vertical blind is also great at blocking out light, so is a great option for rooms where screens feature, such as living rooms or offices, and due to it's waterproof fabric, is also a smart option for bathrooms or kitchensat swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new vertical blind is made by their expert team, in their yorkshire workshop, and comes with a free five year guarantee and customer-first aftercare.
